ui.menuAboutGameDescription: Wayward be a challengin' turn-based, top-down, wilderness survival roguelike. Explore, build, and most importantly, survive in these unforgivin' lands.
ui.menuAboutTextSpecialThanksTestorsAndDona: An extra special thank ye t' all th' early testers, donators, and other supporters.
ui.menuAboutSectionLibrariesDescription: Wayward be made possible with th' followin' projects:
ui.menuBindingsDescription: Configure th' keybinds fer all o' th' game's actions.
ui.menuChangelogDescription: View major and minor updates t' Wayward.
ui.menuChangelogHeadingFailedLoad: Failed t' load th' changelog fer {0}.
ui.menuMultiplayerDescription: Join yer companions on their adventures.
ui.menuHelpDescription: Information, guides, and other help fer playin' Wayward.
ui.menuHighscoresDescription: See how well ye did in yer past adventures.
ui.menuMainButtonModsAllDisabled: All mods have been disabled due t' th' version change.
ui.menuModsWarningModsDisabledDescription: Ye have updated t' a new major version o' Wayward. T' prevent potential issues, all mods have been preemptively disabled.
ui.menuModsDescription: Manage installed mods and publish yer own.
ui.menuModsSubmenuEditInternalModsDescripti: Edit th' list o' internal mods.
ui.menuNewGameDescription: Create a new world with yer choice o' settings.
ui.menuNewGameChoiceMultiplayerDescription: Allow friends t' join yer world. Limited t' real-time turns mode.
ui.menuNewGameChoiceTurnModeSimulatedDescri: Turns happen automatically as lon' as player(s) be performin' actions.
ui.menuNewGameChoiceDifficultyTooltipMaxSav: Ye have used all {0} save slots. As Challenge Mode requires no save slot, it be th' only difficulty ye may choose.
ui.menuNewGameChoiceDifficultyChallengeDail: A randomized challenge every day, that everyone aroun' th' world will have th' chance t' play!
ui.menuNewGameButtonMilestonesDescription: Enable and disable benefits and new challenges unlocked via th' completion o' milestones.
ui.menuNewGameChoiceClientsInheritHostModif: All clients will inherit th' chosen modifiers below. Fer instance, if choosin' th' 'Friendly' modifier, all players will start with a tamed creature, regardless o' whether they have th' milestone themselves.
ui.menuNewGameChoiceCustomModifiersDescript: All clients will be able t' choose their own modifiers when joinin' th' server.
ui.menuMilestoneModifiersDescription: Add benefits or extra challenges t' this game.
ui.menuCustomGameOptionsDescription: Customize how th' game will play.
ui.menuCustomGameOptionsApplyTravelingEffec: Determines whether players lose stamina and gain hunger/thirst when travelin' t' other islands.
ui.menuCustomGameOptionsCreaturesAberrantSp:
Whether th' game should spawn tougher versions o' creatures.
{#--TEXT-SECONDARY:Currently set to:} {0}
ui.menuCustomGameOptionsCreaturesSpawnLimit: Limit th' amount o' creatures that can spawn on map generation or randomly.
ui.menuCustomGameOptionsBenignityMultiplier: Scales th' benignity gained from actions.
ui.menuCustomGameOptionsMalignityMultiplier: Scales th' malignity gained from actions.
ui.menuCustomGameOptionsEternalNightDescrip: Th' moon will ne'er set; th' sun will ne'er rise.
ui.menuCustomGameOptionsEternalDayDescripti: Th' sun will ne'er set; th' moon will ne'er rise.
ui.menuCustomGameOptionsTimeDayLengthToolti: Th' number o' turns/ticks in a day.
ui.menuCustomGameOptionsTimeDayPercentToolt: A number representin' how much o' th' day be "daytime" and, inversely, how much o' th' day be {/not/} "night time".
ui.menuCustomGameOptionsStatusEffectPassCha: When {0}, scales th' chance o' th' negative effect passin'.
ui.menuCustomGameOptionsStatusEffectUntreat: Whether this status effect be untreatable - if checked, th' effect must pass naturally.
ui.menuCustomGameOptionsSkillInitialRandomC: Th' random startin' skills may be overwritten by custom startin' skills.
ui.menuCustomGameOptionsSkillMultiplierTool: Scales th' rate at which this skill be gained.
ui.menuCustomGameOptionsRandomItemsDescript: If disabled, players will spawn in th' world without startin' items.
ui.menuNewsDescription: Come across information pertainin' t' th' game and its updates.
ui.menuOptionsButtonDisplayArticleInObjectN: By default, object names include an article. Fer instance, "A Branch" or "An Bilge-suckin' Wolf". Disablin' this option removes th' article, resultin' in "Branch" and "Bilge-suckin' Wolf".
ui.menuOptionsButtonSaveDataBackupsTooltip: Backs up th' last 5 saves t' th' backup folder.
ui.menuOptionsButtonTracingRecordingtToolti:
Records performance trace files t' th' logs folder. Useful fer debuggin' performance issues.
Note: These files can get very large very fast. Try not t' record fer too lon'.
ui.menuOptionsButtonDropLocationFeetWhenFac: Drop Items at Feet When Facin' Tile be Blocked
ui.menuOptionsHeadingGameplayOptionsDescrip: These options can also be configured in-game with th' Quick Settings dialog.
ui.menuOptionsTooltipTurnDelay: Th' amount o' movement delay that occurs after switchin' a direction or turnin'.
ui.menuOptionsTooltipMouseTurnDelay: Th' amount o' movement delay that occurs after switchin' a direction or turnin' when usin' yer mouse.
ui.menuOptionsTooltipUiScaleClamped: Currently clamped t' {#--TEXT-SECONDARY:{0}} by th' viewport resolution.
ui.menuOptionsTooltipControlsFilter: Filter th' game's bindable actions. Ye can do multiple selections at once with a comma {#--TEXT-SECONDARY:({#--COLOR-BIND:,})} and invert a selection by prefixin' it with an exclamation point {#--TEXT-SECONDARY:({#--COLOR-BIND:!})}
ui.menuOptionsBindChoose: Press anythin' t' choose th' replacement bindin'.
ui.menuOptionsBindChooseAdd: Press anythin' t' choose an additional bindin'.
ui.menuOptionsButtonAllowAlternatingDirecti: If checked, ye will move in alternatin' directions when two directions be pressed or diagonal angles be used with th' mouse.
ui.menuOptionsButtonAlwaysShowMoreInformati: If checked, ye will ne'er have t' hold down a key t' show more information in tooltips.
ui.menuOptionsButtonAutoGatherHarvestToolti: If checked, ye will automatically chop/mine/harvest when movin' into resource tiles (with whichever hand(s) ye have selected).
ui.menuOptionsButtonDisableUIEffectsTooltip: If checked, animations and other effects on th' UI will be disabled, possibly reducin' GPU and CPU load on some devices.
ui.menuOptionsButtonDisableUIOpacityTooltip: If checked, opacity (transparency) will be disabled on UI elements, possibly reducin' GPU and CPU load on some devices.
ui.menuOptionsButtonAutoAttackTooltip: If checked, ye will automatically attack when movin' into a creature or player (with PVP enabled) with whichever hand(s) ye have selected.
ui.menuOptionsButtonAutoPickupTooltip: If checked, ye will automatically loot items as ye move on top o' them.
ui.menuOptionsButtonAutoPickupOnIdleTooltip: If checked, ye will automatically loot items under yer character when ye idle.
ui.menuOptionsButtonDropOnDismantleTooltip: If checked, ye will automatically drop items under yer character when dismantlin' items.
ui.menuOptionsButtonDropOnGatherHarvestTool: If checked, ye will automatically drop items under yer character as ye chop/mine/harvest/dn' them.
ui.menuOptionsButtonKeepSortActiveTooltip: If checked, yer duffle will keep sortin' automatically as ye get items.
ui.menuOptionsButtonProtectCraftingItemsCon: If checked items inside equipped and quickslotted containers won't be used in craftin'.
ui.menuOptionsButtonProtectCraftingItemsInI: If checked, equipped and quickslotted items won't be used in craftin'.
ui.menuOptionsButtonUseAdjacentContainersTo: If checked, items in adjacent containers or tiles can be used in craftin' and other actions.
ui.menuOptionsButtonHideEquippedHeadgearToo: If checked, equipped headgear on yer character will not be visible t' ye.
ui.menuOptionsButtonAutoSaveTooltip: If enabled, yer game will periodically be saved t' help avoid data loss.
ui.menuOptionsButtonWarnOnDangerousActionsT: If checked, a confirmation screen will display when steppin' over doodads or objects that could injure ye.
ui.menuOptionsButtonWarnWhenBreakingItemsOn: If checked, a confirmation screen will display when tryin' t' craft/dismantle usin' items that will break on use or failure.
If checked, a confirmation screen will display when tryin' t' use damaged items that may break on use.
ui.menuOptionsTooltipDialogOpacity: Controls how opaque th' in-game dialogs be.
ui.menuOptionsDeveloperUIExperimentsDescrip: New work-in-progress UI functionality. Use at yer own risk — these experimentations may cause catastrophic errors! Only enable these if ye know what you're doin'.
ui.menuOptionsButtonSaveCompressionTooltip: Reduces th' size o' saves by up t' 80%, at th' cost o' longer save and load times. Useful when space be limited.
ui.menuPauseTooltipNotPaused: In multiplayer, th' game does not pause unless th' host has paused it.
ui.menuPauseParagraphDedicatedServer: Th' server be up and runnin'.

ui.menuMultiplayerOptionsCopyGameCodeToolti: Copy th' game code t' yer clipboard. Share it with yer friends t' play together!
